alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:41PM CDT until March 27 at 5:06AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, severe depths of flooding of crop and pasturelands occur from Shady Point to Arkoma. Several roads crossing the Poteau River are totally impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 32.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 39.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
